name: collection
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tle.
Tool description: API provides up to date NORAD two line element sets for number of Earth orbiting satellites. Data is provided by CelesTrak and served in web application friendly JSON format.
API description: Fetches TLE (Two-Line Element) data from the TLE API based on the specified search query.

search.description: The search term to query the API. Defaults to 'ISS'.
